alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 5:27AM EST until December 15 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 600 AM EST. * At 527 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Doerun, or 13 miles northwest of Moultrie, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Poulan and Poulan around 555 AM EST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Minton, Pritchetts, Scooterville, Anderson City, Ticknor, Tempy, Minnesota and Powelltown. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
